Eastern & Oriental Express | World Journeys | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Eastern & Oriental Express 4 Days | Singapore to Johor Step aboard the Eastern & Oriental Express with World Journeys and experience Southeast Asia in timeless luxury. Glide from vibrant Singapore through lush Malaysian landscapes, historic towns, and emerald rainforests — all while indulging in fine dining, elegant cabins, and world-class service. Each day reveals new adventures, from cultural encounters in Penang to wildlife walks in Taman Negara. This is not just a journey — it’s an unforgettable passage through the heart of the Orient, where every mile is a moment of discovery and indulgence. Deal Details Travel Dates Apr - Oct 26 Priced From $8,455 per person Enquire Now Step aboard the Eastern & Oriental Express with World Journeys and experience Southeast Asia in timeless luxury. Glide from vibrant Singapore through lush Malaysian landscapes, historic towns, and emerald rainforests — all while indulging in fine dining, elegant cabins, and world-class service. Each day reveals new adventures, from cultural encounters in Penang to wildlife walks in Taman Negara. This is not just a journey — it’s an unforgettable passage through the heart of the Orient, where every mile is a moment of discovery and indulgence. Journey Highlights Taman Negara National Park — Wander through one of the world’s oldest rainforests, spotting wildlife, enjoying nature walks and immersing yourself in lush wilderness. World Journeys New Zealand+2Mediahub - Belmond+2 George Town (Penang) — Explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed streets, colonial architecture, vibrant street art, and sample Penang’s renowned food scene. Mediahub - Belmond+2World Journeys New Zealand+2 State-of-the-art cabins & observation car — Stay in Pullman, State or Presidential suites with elegant décor, ensuite bathrooms, and take in panoramic vistas from the open-air observation car Culinary experiences — Onboard dining with authentic local flavours and themed meals, from Peranakan to Malay classics. What's Included Three nights onboard the luxury Eastern & Oriental Express All table d’hote meals Excursions escorted by expert guides A selection of wines, spirits, beers and soft drinks Presidential Suites also enjoy champagne plus complimentary mini-bar Dedicated 24-hour steward service Return transfers between your Singapore hotel and the train Pricing Pullman Cabin from $8,455 State Cabin from $12,360 Presidential Suite from $22,360 Pricing is person, twin share 2026 Departure Dates 6, 20, 27 Apr 4 May 20, 27 Jul 3, 31 Aug 7,14,28 Sep 5, 12, 26 Oct Itineray Day 1: Singapore > Gemas Settle into your air-conditioned cabin as you travel through lush green landscapes. Day 2: Jungle Line to Taman Negara Enjoy a wildlife excursion into Taman Negara National Park, one of the oldest tropical rainforests in the world. Day 3: West Coast Line to Penang Explore Penang Island on an art tour or a food tour with cooking class, or opt to explore independently by tri-shaw. Day 4: Johor > Singapore Travel through the rainforests and beaches of Johor, crossing the strait to Singapore where your journey ends. Terms & Conditions Prices vary seasonally, are subject to change due to currency fluctuations, and surcharges may apply over festive periods. Please enquire for specific travel dates as a quote for cross-season dates may be required. Further World Journeys terms & conditions apply, see https://worldjourneys.co.nz/terms/ Experience the world differently.
